thread.title: Conservative conference: Boris Johnson's rugby scrum joke
thread.title_full: Conservative conference: Boris Johnson's rugby scrum joke - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Conservative conference: Boris Johnson's rugby scrum joke
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device
Conservative conference: Boris Johnson's rugby scrum joke 6 October 2015 Last updated at 13:17 BST
London Mayor Boris Johnson drew laughs and applause from delegates at the Conservative Party conference when he made a joke comparing his policies to a rugby scrum.
During his speech, he said his "happiest, formative afternoons" were spent as part of a rugby scrum, bound "tightly and correctly, in my case to the hooker".
"Insert joke here, as Jeremy Corbyn's autocue would doubtless say," he added.
